title: Bitcoin feels quiet. Similar phases mattered in past cycles. #shorts #bitcoin #crypto
transcript: Welcome to another episode and as right now Bitcoin is still in this range and people have been checking out. I see more and more people leaving crypto somehow checking out. But the thing is this is the calm before the storm. If you look at what we saw during the last bear right here, we're currently kind of in this position right here. And if you look at the chart, you see something very interesting. And that's that if we measure the distance from the peak to when we visited the 50 book moving average last cycle, it was here in February. If you measure the same distance basically from this peak right here to this pump to the 50 moving average and then you apply the same logic here, it could still mean that we have time until middle to late February to come back and touch the 50 moving average which is currently at 100K. So this dream of 50 moving average is still possible very very possible.
